title: Matt Rhule Fired As Panthers Head Coach
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss Tonight’s Chiefs/Raiders matchup, Matt Rhule being fired as Carolina Panthers Head Coach and Adam Schefter breaks down injury news from around the league.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Matt Rhule is out as Panthers Head Coach and previewing tonight's Raiders/Chiefs matchup on MNF.
